sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export const ProductCard = (props) => { const { id, title, name, overview, poster_path, media_type, vote_average, } = props; const myTitle = name ? name : title const poster = `https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/${poster_path}` const myOverview = overview.length > 100 ? `${overview.substring(0, 99)}...` : overview; return (
{myTitle}

{myOverview}

Rating: {vote_average}

... See More
) }
